name: Raines Law Room's Pioneer Spirit
description: Raines Law Room's Meaghan Dorman uses rye, applejack, and orgeat in this warming, subtly nutty spin on the Old Fashioned.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Laird's 7 1/2 Year Old Apple Brandy

recipeInstructions.text: Add bitters, orgeat, whiskey, and brandy to a double rocks glass. Add a large block of ice and stir until chilled, about 15 seconds.
Squeeze orange twist skin side down to spray oils on top. Place in drink as garnish and serve.
